mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu_item (restaurateur_id, name, category, price, image_url, description, status, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{restaurateurId}, #{name}, #{category}, #{price}, #{imageUrl}, #{description}, #{status}, #{deleted}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE menu_item SET name = #{name}, category = #{category}, price = #{price}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id} AND restaurateur_id = #{restaurateurId} AND COALESCE(is_deleted, 0) = 0
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT category FROM menu_item WHERE restaurateur_id = #{restaurateurId} AND COALESCE(is_deleted, 0) = 0 AND category IS NOT NULL AND category <> '' ORDER BY category
